pr_title: Resolve cloud when removing dynamic template

timeline.message: Resolve cloud when removing dynamic template

timeline.bodyText: Will this fail the build if the cloud is not found? Is that the desired affect? I guess it would alert the user of an issue.
timeline.author: cwholmes

replies.bodyText: This would happen only if the cloud is removed while running the step. I guess it is highly unlikely to happen (unless you're actively changing the instance configuration, and in that case it wouldn't be unexpected to see some jobs failing as a result of removing the kubernetes cloud).
replies.author: Vlatombe

timeline.message: Don't fail the build, just print a warning if can't remove the cloud

timeline.bodyText: Is it a good idea to mute this exception?
timeline.author: twasyl

timeline.message: Check that the pod template is indeed removed
